attributes.action: publicly condemn Tom Hicks and George Gillette for the unethical and disgraceful way they have conducted themselves in their capacity as owners of Liverpool Football Club, one of Britain's great sporting institutions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Liverpool Football Club is a club of great tradition. It is a club that has added some of the most colourful pages to the books of sporting history. It is a club that has paid respect to it's traditions for generations.

Tom Hicks and George Gillette have abandoned the traditions for which the club is so rightfully famous, all so that they can make obscene profits from our great name..... a name that they have dragged through the mud.

Sign this petition to register your disgust at the owners, and hope that our plea is heard.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
